title: Create config.json with WiFi, Time, and OTA settings
description: Create initial /data/config.json with nested structure containing WiFi credentials (station/AP modes), NTP server, timezone, and OTA configuration. Include sensible defaults.
acceptance_criteria: WiFi section with station SSID/password, AP password, retry parameters
Time section with NTP server, timezone, sync timeout, confidence window
OTA section with enabled flag, port, hostname prefix
JSON structure is valid and well-formatted
Contains reasonable defaults for all settings
Tested: config loads without errors via ArduinoJson
